alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 04 at 3:48PM HST until December 05 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... .A moderate size northwest (320 degree) medium period swell will keep surf above advisory levels along north and west- facing shores into tonight. A larger northwest swell will begin filling in late tonight into Tuesday morning. This swell may lift surf to warning levels Tuesday. Therefore, this High Surf Advisory may be upgraded to a High Surf Warning later tonight. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT...15 to 20 foot surf along north-facing shores into tonight, 20 to 25 feet beginning early Tuesday. 10 to 15 foot surf along west-facing shores into tonight. 15 to 20 feet beginning early Tuesday. * WHERE...North and west-facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu and Molokai. North-facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate to strong. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
